alert.note: Alert for Maricopa; Pinal (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 31 at 8:47PM MST until August 31 at 9:45PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: The National Weather Service in Phoenix has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Maricopa County in south central Arizona... Pinal County in southeastern Arizona... * Until 945 PM MST. * At 846 PM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Sun Lakes, moving northwest at 30 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Chandler, Gilbert, Casa Grande, Sun Lakes, Queen Creek, Blackwater, Chandler Heights, Tumbleweed Park, Seville, Bapchule, Olberg, San Tan Mountain Park, Firebird Lake, Sacaton, and Santan. This includes the following highways... AZ Route 87 between mile markers 139 and 165. AZ Route 202 between mile markers 42 and 54. AZ Route 101 near mile marker 61. AZ Route 347 between mile markers 176 and 189. This includes AZ Interstate 10 between 162 and 188. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
